data.text/markdown:
Live wandb charts

This demo starts multiple wandb runs with different learning rates, logs metrics with a delay, and the WandbChart widget polls the wandb GraphQL API from JavaScript to render live-updating line charts. Each widget shows one metric as a line chart. Pass multiple runs via runs= to compare them side by side in the same chart.

data.text/markdown: You can also have charts that only poll manually.
